nodes.text: A Keelboat was a type of boat used to transport individuals. A special type of keelboat was able to transport individuals across the lava rivers of the lava fields on the Outer Rim planet Nevarro. Around 9 ABY, one such boat was operated by a ferry droid who helped Din Djarin, Cara Dune, Greef Karga, and IG-11 rescue the Child from Imperial pursuers.
